CustomField.description: -Maximize staff engagement and monitor the local labor environment to address issues with HR -Increase management effectiveness: recruit, train, coach, counsel, & discipline the team with HR -Staffing process; ensure effective work processes, systems, & teamwork to maximize individual and overall performance -Convey values, strategies, and objectives clearly & promptly -Team rapport: foster open communication & spend time with the frontline team -Plan, monitor, and appraise job results
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Maximize staff engagement and monitor the local labor environment to address issues with HR -Increase management effectiveness: recruit, train, coach, counsel, & discipline the team with HR -Staffing process; ensure effective work processes, systems, & teamwork to maximize individual and overall performance -Convey values, strategies, and objectives clearly & promptly -Team rapport: foster open communication & spend time with the frontline team -Plan, monitor, and appraise job results
CustomField.label: Team Management
